Coming down from its $999 price tag here, we saw costs taken down to this same low rate back during the brand’s Black Friday sale event two weeks ago. For those who didn’t jump on the deal then, you’re getting another chance here today, thanks to the 35% markdown cutting $350 from the going rate to land back at the all-time lowest tracked price. Head below to see the other models also benefitting from discounts right now.

Don’t forget to enter promo code IEO2SJW3 during checkout to see the discounted price. This display-equipped model typically goes for $100, and it’s now seeing a straight-up $41 discount. They dropped to $70 earlier this year in August ahead of the fall Prime Day sale, but today’s deal steps it up with an additional $11 discount. items.title: Sleek, smart, and simple: Hands-on with the Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium
items.summary:
My wife and I recently moved into a new home, and it came with your standard, no-frills thermostat. In my case, A Honeywell Home ProSeries that has no wifi or smart features of any kind and is as boring-looking as you can get. It’s also not very intuitive, and programming it feels more tedious than it should.

Our previous home had an Ecobee thermostat that we really liked, but it was a much older (and now discontinued) model and not worth the trouble of removing and reinstalling at our new house. Knowing that we wanted another Ecobee, I thought it was be the perfect time to upgrade to Ecobee’s flagship model, the Smart Thermostat Premium.

more…
